Research Intern, Heterogeneous Mobile Edge Computing Location: Santa Clara, CA (R&D;) Req #: 9326 # of Openings: 1 DescriptionBusiness Justification MEC is recognized as one of the key emerging technologies for 5G networks. Heterogeneous computing will play a critical role for future edge computing platforms. Keys to HSA are common tools to support an increasing array of processing solutions and a common intermediate language to allow programming for and portability to other platforms. Project - Work alongside members of the Architecture & Advanced Technologies team of NFV Competence Center to conduct research and development on heterogeneous computing to address mobile edge computing challenges from context-aware performance optimization to smart and efficient MEC scheduling to optimize resource allocation and to enhance reliability and scalability.
